title: Kavya Sahgal Architects
description: Comprehensive branding and advertisement design for an architectural firm, focusing on modern aesthetics and professional presentation.
longDescription: Created a sophisticated advertisement campaign for Kavya Sahgal Architects, emphasizing their expertise in contemporary architectural design. The design incorporates clean lines, professional typography, and strategic use of white space to convey trust and expertise in the architectural field. The campaign features elegant interior photography showcasing their architectural excellence with luxury furniture and sophisticated design elements.

title: Sanwaliya Printing Solutions
description: Complete brand identity design including advertisements and visiting cards for a printing solutions company.
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive brand identity for Sanwaliya Printing Solutions, including advertisement designs and visiting card layouts. The design emphasizes reliability, quality, and professionalism in the printing industry through strategic color choices and typography. The brand features a distinctive logo with traditional Indian design elements and modern geometric patterns.

title: Mobile App UI
description: Modern mobile application user interface design with focus on user experience and contemporary design trends.
longDescription: Designed a sleek and intuitive mobile application interface for Priyanshu Fulwani. The design focuses on user-centric approach with modern UI elements, smooth interactions, and a clean visual hierarchy that enhances user engagement and usability. Features include login/register screens, profile management, and social media integration with a cohesive blue and white color scheme.

title: Global Woodens House
description: Complete marketing package including brochures, visiting cards, and invoice design for a wooden furniture company.
longDescription: Created a comprehensive marketing materials package for Global Woodens House, featuring detailed product brochures showcasing their wooden furniture collection, professional visiting cards, and well-designed invoice templates. The design emphasizes the natural beauty and quality of wooden products through rich wood textures and elegant typography, featuring traditional Indian wooden swings and furniture pieces.

title: Shree Balaji Investments
description: Professional design materials for a financial services company including banners and invitation designs.
longDescription: Developed sophisticated design materials for Shree Balaji Investments, focusing on trust, professionalism, and financial expertise. The designs include promotional banners and elegant invitation materials for their grand opening event. The design features luxury gold and black color scheme with traditional Indian motifs and modern financial graphics, reflecting the company's expertise in equities, SIP, mutual funds, and other investment services.

title: Charika Modi Personal Branding
description: Eye-catching banner design for personal branding and professional presentation.
longDescription: Created a striking banner design for Charika Modi focusing on personal branding and professional image. The design balances modern aesthetics with personal touch, creating a memorable visual identity that reflects professionalism and approachability.

title: Bhati Nashta Corner Food Banner
description: Vibrant banner design for a food service business specializing in traditional Indian breakfast and snacks.
longDescription: Designed an appetizing banner for Bhati Nashta Corner, capturing the essence of delicious street food and traditional Indian breakfast preparations. The design features mouth-watering food photography of Poha, Idli Sambar, and Maggi with vibrant colors and appetizing imagery to attract customers. The design incorporates traditional Hindi typography and modern layout elements.

title: Professional Visiting Cards Collection
description: Diverse collection of professional visiting card designs for various industries and professionals.
longDescription: Created a comprehensive collection of visiting card designs for different professionals including RJ Jewellery, Royal Enfield dealership, Design Develop Deploy, and Triveni Gas Agency. Each design is tailored to reflect the unique identity and professionalism of the respective business, featuring industry-specific design elements and color schemes.

title: Professional Invoice Templates
description: Clean and professional invoice template designs for various business documentation needs.
longDescription: Developed clean, professional invoice templates that balance functionality with aesthetic appeal. The designs ensure clear information hierarchy while maintaining a professional appearance suitable for various business types. Features templates for Global Woodens House and Sanwaliya Printing Solutions with custom branding and layout optimization.

title: Shree Ji Tuition Classes Educational Banner
description: Bilingual educational banner design for tuition classes offering English medium education.
longDescription: Created an elegant banner design for Shree Ji Tuition Classes, featuring bilingual content in English and Hindi. The design emphasizes educational excellence and professional teaching services for classes from Nursery to 7th grade, with decorative floral elements and clear hierarchy of information.
